item.title: Prometheon
item.description:
INTRODUCTION

If you’ve fiddled around with LLM jailbreaking, you’ve definitely seen this format of game before. The AI has a secret that they’ve been instructed to never divulge, and our task is to get them to divulge it. Fun! 🎉

This challenge was fairly easy. It’s good to know a few prompting tricks. Thankfully, even some pretty basic tricks worked fine - no need to use every trick all at once. There are five stages to this challenge, each of increasing difficulty. The “secret” for each stage doesn’t follow any predefined format, so be sure to figure out the theme of the secrets - this will help you identify the secret if/when the AI divulges it.
